sourcing.instructions: - Erbium Oxide: Purchase from chemical supply companies or online marketplaces.
steps: - Erbium Oxide: Purchase from chemical supply companies or online marketplaces.
1. In a clean container, combine 70.00 g of Erbium Oxide, 60.00 g of Indium Oxide, and 40.00 g of Antimony Trioxide.
preparation.raw_text: 1. In a clean container, combine 70.00 g of Erbium Oxide, 60.00 g of Indium Oxide, and 40.00 g of Antimony Trioxide.

steps: 1. Preheat a furnace or kiln to 1000째C (1832째F).
heating.raw_text: 1. Preheat a furnace or kiln to 1000째C (1832째F).

steps: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 2-3 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 2-3 hours).

steps: 1. Sand the edges and surfaces of the solid sample to achieve a smooth finish.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Sand the edges and surfaces of the solid sample to achieve a smooth finish.
